page.title: 02ALLET, NEAR TRURO.
page.content: This hamlet on the busy B3284 Truro- Perranporth road consists of about 20 scattered houses of different styles, & a Methodist Chapel,a focal point for the lively local community.The nearest shop,post-office,garage,primary school & pub are in Shortlanesend 1mile away. Most people do their shopping weekly in Truro supermarkets (Tesco, Liptons, International),department stores(Marks & Spencer, Littlewoods, Woolworths, Roberts,& Dingles) & the many smaller specialist shops, often on Wednesday when farmers go to livestock market. Properties include several farms, plant-nurseries & smallholdings,houses & bungalows with a little land, & two registered caravan & camping sites. It is a convenient base for holidaymakers near the north Cornwall coast. Several farms offer accommodation for bed & breakfast.
